title: Flag: Scotland
description: The flag for Scotland, a country in the United Kingdom. May show as the letters gbsct.
apple_vendor_description: The flag of Scotland, as rendered on Apple devices, presents a vibrant heraldic blue field adorned with a crisp white saltire.  Apple's signature 3D shading gives the flag a subtle depth, with realistic lighting highlighting the folds and texture of the fabric.  This iconic representation of Scotland is perfect for expressing national pride or referencing Scottish culture in your digital communications.
